article.title: A4 to Construct Nellis AFB Network Control Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: A4 Construction Company Incorporated, Salt Lake City, Utah, was awarded a $9,326,701 firm-fixed-price contract for the design and construction of a communications network control center, Nellis Air Force Base, Nevada. Work will be performed at Nellis Air Force Base. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Los Angeles, California, is the contracting activity.
